name: Light Seekers
description:
"Before the darkness, there was light..."

"We called it the Sun"

"But now there is... nothing"

"Nothing"

"And I am supposed to save it"

Light Seekers is a choice-based game based on a dystopian future. A future brought about by the consequence of man's own corruption of nature. The plot follows a consultant tasked with making difficult choices that may alter the course of the people he is supposed to save as well as his own fate.  Making compromises as well as sacrifices is  a major part of your job. 

When Mother Nature forces the darkness on us, would you retain the light of humanity or would you become one with it?
